bibl.bibl: Bell, Charles. 1836. The nervous system of the human body: as explained in a series of papers read before the Royal Society of London. 3d edition. Edinburgh: Adam and Charles Black. London: Longman, Rees, Orme, Brown, Green, and Longman.
bibl.idno: NC c. 129 CCC.46.346. NB these books are not numbered on the spine. 3d bay from where you enter, 2d shelf up, right-hand end of row, tied with string (no spine). SE.
